messages.title: Why I am backing Mike Robb
messages.content: David Stewart and Rhoda Grant, Scottish Labour Highland MSPs, support Mike Robb for being a strong local voice who understands the constituency. They criticize the Tories and the SNP for cutting services and holding the economy back.

messages.title: Scotland deserves a pay rise
messages.content: Mike Robb expresses support for Labour's £10 an hour real living wage, stating that people in the constituency deserve fair pay for a fair day's work.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike Robb vows to stand up for public services in the Highlands, ensuring local schools and hospitals receive funding they need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: No to a hard Brexit and IndyRef2
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike Robb positions himself as a local champion opposing a damaging hard Brexit and a second independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Yes to a better, fairer politics
keyPolicies.policyDescription: He calls for an economy working for the many, not just the few, promising a real living wage and a halt to the Trade Union Bill.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Labour on 8 June is a vote for a team run for the many, not the few.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposes IndyRef2 and a hard Brexit. Seeks to protect Scotland's economy by fighting for a Brexit that works for everyone.
issues.economy: Pledges to fight austerity measures put forward by both the Tories and the SNP and supports a real living wage.
issues.health: Committed to making sure local hospitals receive the funding they need.
issues.socialWelfare: Wants to protect tax credits for those in work and benefits for those who can't find it.

contactInformation.address: The Scottish Labour Party, 3 Gordon Terrace, Inverness, IV2 3HD

quotes.text: We're backing Mike Robb as a strong local voice for this constituency.
quotes.source: David Stewart and Rhoda Grant Scottish Labour Highland MSPs

quotes.text: Scotland deserves a pay rise. That is why I support Labour's £10 an hour real living wage. People in this constituency deserve a fair day's pay for a fair day's work. We need an economy that works for the many not the few.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet solicits involvement and support for Mike Robb's campaign, with options for voting Labour and how to get a 'Vote Labour' poster.
